overview: Bluebird Films is back with Glamtie volume 2. How do you keep a hot girl? Tie her up! The gorgeous glambirds get bound and gagged in Max Cool's Glamtie. It's an all girl on girl feature that takes place everywhere from a dark dungeon, to a dirty prison, to an upscale bedroom. You'll wanna stay, because you're not going anywhere for a while!
title: Glamtie 2
